mapper.select: SELECT RE.*, MASTER_NO, MM.NAME AS MASTER_NAME, MM.ADDRESS FROM REVIEW RE JOIN REQUEST REQ ON RE.REQ_NO = REQ.REQ_NO JOIN MEMBER MM ON MM.ME_NO = REQ.MASTER_NO
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEW (re_no, req_no, content, star_score) VALUES (review_seq.NEXTVAL, #{reqNo}, #{content}, #{starScore})
